title: Girl, 2, in critical condition after holiday shooting, police say
content:
DETROIT — Police say a 2-year-old girl has been wounded in a shooting that happened after some men were asked to leave a holiday gathering in Detroit.
Police say the shooting was investigated early Tuesday on the city's east side and happened as people had gathered near a library and car wash to celebrate the Fourth of July.
The child was taken to a hospital for treatment. Officer Nicole Kirkwood tells The Detroit News that the girl was in critical condition.
And on Monday afternoon, police say a 14-year-old boy who was walking with friends was wounded after encountering another group of people. He was listed in temporary serious condition.
